title: Order Dualie Replicas
paragraphs: The Order Dualie Replicas are a main weapon in Splatoon 3. They are a variant of the Splat Dualies with the same stats, but with the visual design of the Order Dualies. They are a direct successor to the Splatoon 2 Hero Dualie Replicas.
The Order Dualie Replicas are identical in appearance to the Order Dualies. They are mainly white with silver nozzles.

The Order Dualie Replicas are visually identical to the Order Dualies but are simply re-skinned Splat Dualies. Therefore, unlike the switchable sub weapons of the Order Dualies, it comes with Suction Bombs and Crab Tank. To unlock the Order Dualie Replicas, the player must complete the Order Dualies' Palette in Side Order, in which they become available to redeem at the Lobby Terminal.
For competitive tips about the Order Dualie Replicas
Note: the strategy advice for the Splat Dualies also applies to the Order Dualie Replicas, so they share the same strategy page.
